name: I'm late for work AND I'm stuck in a time loop!?
name_original: I'm late for work AND I'm stuck in a time loop!?
description:
I'll be honest, I think the title explains itself.

There are 3/4 endings, and I would recommend you only play through once. A playthrough will probably take about 5 minutes. 

Please also be aware of the content warnings. 

Sound by Sidearm Studios and ZapSplat

Cover Art Photo by CHUTTERSNAP on Unsplash
